column4: hey guys, got a question about graphic drivers in ubuntu. right now i'm running hardy alpha 5 release, and so i'm waitin for the new envy release to get the latest nvidia drivers. now i'm running the default ones and i'm gettin high temps while i do anything. i assume this is normal and might get fixed when i install the proper drivers?
cause this never happened before, atleast when i was running xp it didnt get this high
you should join #ubuntu+1 for that and envy is not supported
not sure if Hardy has vmware in it yet--it is still only alpha 5
